error.no_credit_options_for_product: Sorry but no options available for selected product

credit_rates.choose_rate_title: Choose duration and monthly payment on the drop down below
credit_rates.rate_help_text: If you repay your loan before the installment period of {{ payment_free_duration }} month(s) expires, it only costs the startup fee: {{ establishment_fee }}. There must always be a maturity of min. 12 months after the repayment period. When redeeming before time, contact the customer service of Santander Consumer Bank.
credit_rates.monthly_administration_fee_note: Account fee {{ monthly_administration_fee }} is included in all calculations. Funds can be returned within 14 days
credit_rates.rate_line2: Including {{ payment_free_duration }} of payment free duration

rate_dropdown.title: {{ monthly_payment }}/month for {{ payment_duration }}
rate_dropdown.pretitle: No payment for the first {{ payment_free_duration }}, then

application_success.title: Order confirmed. Thank you.
application_success.finish_application_description: By clicking on Finish application we will direct you to the digital contract center of Santander, where you can download your loan contract and verify your identity using post- or video-identification. You’ll also receive the link to this portal via email, so you may also complete this process later on if you’d prefer that. The merchant will ship your order as soon as you have completed all the required steps.
application_success.finish_application_description_pos: By clicking on Finish application we will direct you to the digital contract center of Santander, where you can download your loan contract and verify your identity using post- or video-identification. You’ll also receive the link to this portal via email, so you may also complete this process later on if you’d prefer that.
application_success.finish_application_timer: We guide you back to the handler in {{timer}} seconds

application_check_status_processing.title: We are processing your application
application_check_status_processing.text: It can take up to 3 minutes. Please do not click away

application_pending.title:

application_pending.contacts_note:

tel. 70 23 09 03

application_fail.title:
Unfortunately, we can not provide you
with a loan at this time.

subscribe_to_offers.title: Should we contact you with offers and information about the opportunities and benefits you have as a customer?
subscribe_to_offers.text: Subscribe to our newsletters and keep up-to-date with news, offers and competitions from Santander Consumer Bank and our Partners. If you click on "Yes, please," you allow the Santander Consumer Bank to contact you by email and text with our newsletters as well as offers of our products consisting of car loans, consumer loans, savings, sales finance, insurance and credit cards. Of course, you can always sign up again.

rates.title: Choose rate
rates.no_rates: The chosen amount can’t be financed by Santander

mitid_body.login: You must login at MitID to continue
mitid_body.title: Confirm with MitID
mitid_body.text: By logging in with your NemID and social security number, you create a secure connection so you can easily, quickly and securely approve your loan.

skat_body.login: You must login at Skat to continue
skat_body.title: Give consent to SKAT.dk with your MitID
skat_body.text: We will redirect you to SKAT's website, where you use NemID to authorise SKAT to share your annual tax return and salary information with us. We will only access the information needed for this loan application.

bank_consent.title: Fetch credit information
bank_consent.text: We will redirect to out partner Noitso where you will be asked for consent to get additional credit information by PSD2

step.agree_text:
Santander Consumer Bank, branch of Santander Consumer Bank AS, Norge (hereinafter: Santander), may obtain information about my loans/credits from other companies affiliated with KreditStatus (see the companies at www.kreditstatus.dk). The information that may be obtained is:

  • Identification information, balance, loan type, principal/credit limit and date of origination.
  • Any information about arrears and their dates.

The information may only be used for credit assessment in connection with my application for credit.

It is voluntary whether I wish to consent to Santander collecting and processing information about my credit exposures. If I do not wish to give my consent, it may mean that my creditworthiness cannot be assessed until I have provided Santander with the necessary documentation.

I can withdraw my consent by contacting Santander. However, this will not affect the processing and disclosure of my data that has taken place before the consent is withdrawn. Read more about Santander's processing of your data here.

marketing_consent.label: Receive offers via sms or email give consent

details.title: Permission to contact you
details.text: If you click on "Yes", you give Santander Consumer Bank permission to contact you with news, offers of our products, contests and information about the opportunities and benefits for you as a customer. Of course, you can opt out again at any time.

details.title: Terms and conditions
details.text:
I hereby give my consent to Santander being able to obtain information about my potential loans and credits from the banks and financing companies who are affiliated with KreditStatus. This information may only be used to evaluate my creditworthiness regarding this application with Santander.

Santander has the right to gather the following information about my existing loans and credits via KreditStatus: identification information, type of loan, principal amount of loan/credit max, formation time, and the current balance.

Information about which banks and financing companies that have access to gather information about my credit arrangements from KreditStatus is always available on www.kreditstatus.dk

I am an adult and I hereby confirm that the information I have stated is correct and in accordance with the truth.

I understand that during the processing of this application there will be made a creditworthiness investigation, and that during this investigation information about my economic conditions with credit information bureaus may be exchanged, and that the gathered information will be registered and processed.

I understand that Santander can choose to refuse to grant a loan, if the given information is incorrect, or if Santander in connection with credit approval receives information that impacts the rating.

Regardless of whether a customer relationship will be formed or not, all information stated in the application will be saved by Santander for at least 1 year.

I accept that a possible rejection will not be explained to me, unless it happens on the basis of a search in a database (for example RKI/debtors ledger).

I am aware that information will form a basis for Santander meeting the requirement in the Credit Agreement Act § 7c on the assessment of me being able to repay the lent amount.

Santander can, after you have sent your application, contact you via phone, text message or email to hear if you have any questions regarding the application, our products, etc.

household_budget_percentage.label: What is your share of household cost?
household_budget_percentage.placeholder: What is your share of household cost?

political_exposed_person.label: Are you or a family member of a politically exposed person?
political_exposed_person.placeholder: Are you or a family member of a politically exposed person?

details.text:
SAFE er en forsikring som sikrer, at dit lån bliver betalt, hvis du bliver ufrivilligt arbejdsløs eller uarbejdsdygtig pga. sygdom eller ulykke. SAFE giver tryghed til dig og din familie.

Du kan læse mere om SAFE her.

Forsikringspræmien udgør {{ insurance_percent }} af den månedlige finansieringsydelse, der dags dato udgør {{ insurance_monthly_cost }}. Forsikringspræmien opkræves månedligt samtidig med ydelsen for din finansiering, og reguleres såfremt lånets øvrige betingelser ændres.
Vær opmærksom på at for selvstændige dækker forsikringen hospitalsindlæggelse, uarbejdsdygtighed og dødsfald.

insurance_conditions_accepted.label: Ja, jeg har læst og accepterer betingelserne for SAFE
insurance_conditions_accepted.placeholder: Ja, jeg har læst og accepterer betingelserne for SAFE

details.title: Jeg accepterer betingelserne for SAFE
details.text: Jeg er indforstået med, at sygdom eller personskade som jeg har, eller burde have haft kendskab til ved forsikringens etablering og som jeg senere anmelder, ikke er dækket af forsikringen. Jeg er indforstået med, at hvis jeg har eller burde have haft kendskab til kommende arbejdsløshed, kan disse tilfælde ikke senere føre til krav om forsikringsdækning. Jeg er indforstået med, at arbejdsløshed efter tidsbegrænset ansættelse eller fleksjob ikke er omfattet af SAFE. SAFE træder i kraft, hvis dit lån bliver bevilget og startdatoen på forsikringen vil være den samme dag, som lånet bliver udbetalt til dig. Du skal være opmærksom på, at der for dækning af arbejdsløshed er en kvalifikationsperiode på 180 dage og for uarbejdsdygtighed en kvalifikationsperiode på 30 dage.

total_rent_monthly.label: Mnd. husleje inkl. vand og varme
total_rent_monthly.placeholder: Mnd. husleje inkl. vand og varme

insurance_for_unemployment.label: I am member of an unemployment insurance

pay_with_main_income.label: Yes, I plan to repay with my main income.

product_consent.agree_text: Santander via løbende informere dig pr. mail med information om vores produkter. Ønsker du ikke dette,
product_consent.label: Jeg ønsker ikke, at Santander sender mig information om deres produkter.
